Hero.main: Share and manage all your team's documents

Create.title: Create Workspace
Create.desc: Set up a secure space to manage and share all your important documents.

Configure.title: Configure Settings
Configure.desc: Choose the best plan for your needs and manage user roles with ease.

Share.title: Share
Share.desc: Store and share documents seamlesslyÂ³ with your team members.

LogIn.desc: Enter your details to access your workspace.

Feature.fileDescription: store documents anytime, anywhere and use powerful search capabilities to quickly find documents
Feature.securityDescription: Secure your files by using passwords and record who has viewed and downloaded them to enhance security
Feature.shareDescription: You can invite your team member, share files easily, communicate in real time, and leave feedback on documents without complicated processes.
Feature.aiDescription: Use AI to summarize documents. Even complex documents can get to the point quickly.
